channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL

item.title: Report I-2023090072
item.description:
Report I-2023090072

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: Chicago
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: QATAR AIRWAYS CARGO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 157-91904573 ORD/FRA Total 101 pc/ 9483.5kg Shipment booked as general cargo and arrived at Qatar Airways facility. Commodity in AWB indicated"Consolidation" without any lithium battery statement. One of the freight had ELI label. The shipment was rejected immediately.

item.title: Report E-2023090602
item.description:
Report E-2023090602

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: DES PLAINES
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it is discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of test paper cement (un1133) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the inner metal 128 ounce can had released 10 ounces of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090312
item.description:
Report X-2023090312

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET. UPON INSPECTION, ALL BOTTLES HAD LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAPS. PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. DescribePack: ALL BOTTLES LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED.

item.title: Report X-2023090103
item.description:
Report X-2023090103

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: ADDISON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RMP RESPONDED TO THE SPILL WEARING FULL P.P.E. WITH THE SPILL CART AND DECISION TREE. THEY NOTICED A FLAMMABLE LIQUID STICKER. FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET FOR A FLAMMABLE LIQUID THEY CONTAINERIZED THE SPILL AND CLEANED THE AREA USING ZEP ZORBENT. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED 2 1 GALLON BOTTLES WHERE IN THE PACKAGE AND ONE 1GALLON BOTTLE HAD SHATTERED CAUSING THE LEAK. THEY BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2023081943
item.description:
Report X-2023081943

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: CAROL STREAM
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat package containing a plastic bottle of nitric acid. The box was stained and wet from the bottle having a loose cap and spilled, cap was basically opened when inspected. Had inner packaging inside, could have been mishandled but cannot confirm. DescribePack: Box had big spill stains all over box on top and sides. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed inside a hazmat bag inside a plastic bin with absorbent pads.

item.title: Report X-2023081935
item.description:
Report X-2023081935

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: CAROL STREAM
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat package containing 6 metal cans of acetone. The box was stained with dried acetone spill from one can that had a loose cap and spilled almost all of liquid. Cans are dented and stained from acetone and also had no inner packaging. DescribePack: Box had spill dried up and dark satins around it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed inside a hazmat bag inside a plastic bin with absorbent pads.

DescribePack: Hole/Crack on the bottom rounded edge of the bottle of acid. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately taken to the designated hazmat containment area.
